description: Primes of the form m*2^phi(m)-1 with phi(m) the Euler function, in order of increasing m.
comments: Sorted along increasing n of the definition.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..45
maple: with(numtheory); for n from 1 to 1000 do x := n*2^phi(n)-1: if isprime(x) then print(x): fi:od:
author: _Felice Russo_
